freelook.enableF5.comment: Enables the use of F5 camera modes, though is intended to be disabled. (DEFAULT: false)

freelook.smoothZoom.comment:
Enables smooth camera movement on zoom. When disabled, camera sensitivity will be adjusted
# to fit zoom percentage instead. (DEFAULT: false)

freelook.zoomType.comment:
Type of zoom to emulate. (DEFAULT: 0)
# 0 - "Realistic": Simulates effects of squinting (tunnel vision, slower zoom)
# 1 - Interpolated: Fast, interpolated zooming
# 2 - Classic: Optifine-like snap zoom

freelook.zoomFactor.comment: Percentage to zoom in FOV by. (DEFAULT: 200.0)

freelook.freelookRange.comment: Range of view in Freelook mode. (DEFAULT: 45.0 deg.)
